caption.center: In re ESTATE of Andrew HUMPHREY, Deceased.

opinion.posture: Appeal No. 464 January Term, 1975, from Definitive Decree of Court of Common Pleas, Orphans' Court Division, of Luzerne County at No. 1364 of 1973, Edward W. Lopatto, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Blythe H. Evans, Jr., Wilkes-Barre, for appellant.
Albert N. Danoff, Wilkes-Barre, for appellee, Celia Humphrey.
opinion.panel: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Motion to quash appeal denied, and decree affirmed. SeeEstate of Stanley, 470 Pa. 483, 368 A.2d 1259 (1977).
Costs on appellant.Page 488
